org.gridgain.grid.lang.utils
Class GridAtomicIntegerPair

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.lang.utils.GridAtomicIntegerPair

public class GridAtomicIntegerPair
extends Object

This class provides atomic pair of integer variables.

Parameters:
first - First integer in a pair.
second - Second integer in a pair.
Method Detail

compareAndSet

public boolean compareAndSet(int firstOld,
                             int secondOld,
                             int firstUpdate,
                             int secondUpdate)
Atomically sets the value to the given updated values if the current values == the expected values.

Parameters:
firstOld - Expected value for first int in pair.
secondOld - Expected value for second int in pair.
firstUpdate - Updated value for first int in pair.
secondUpdate - Updated value for second int in pair.
Returns:
True if update was successful,false otherwise.

compareAndSetFirst

public boolean compareAndSetFirst(int old,
                                  int update)
Atomically sets the value of first int in pair to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

Parameters:
old - Expected value.
update - New value.
Returns:
True if update was successful,false otherwise.

compareAndSetSecond

public boolean compareAndSetSecond(int old,
                                   int update)
Atomically sets the value of second int in pair to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

Parameters:
old - Expected value.
update - New value.
Returns:
True if update was successful,false otherwise.

get

public void get(int[] res)
Gets value of both components and stores them into the given array. Parameter must have length at least 2 elements.

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If length of res is less then 2.
Parameters:
res - Array where values should be stored.
